channel.title: Loading Maps
channel.description: Which method loads the mapdata for 508 and how could i make it so that if the txt file doesnt work or doesnt exist then the objects wont load instead of crashing the client? Btw i looked around and couldnt find a thread for this so if there is one already im sorry :D EDIT: I saw xeonix client or whatever its called but its closed source thats the kinda thing i need though, anyone know how to do it?
